body: Well, at least this is better then the author's other work, 72. Now that's what I call depressing.

Lol I don't know what to say the plot is basically revenge cause of his family was lost. But the background was that the bank demanded the debt for the factory paid, the bank employee who did it is the dad of the girls in the hentai. The mom of the rapist did a bad choice in trying to pay of the debt and went to gangster to get the money got into a worse debt and couldn't pay that of until she and her daughter became sex slaves until they killed themselves. Their son killed the gangster but then even blamed the bank employee. (Not clarified if the dad is a bad guy or not just that he was a part of what got the family into debt). Then he goes on to kidnap and rape the dad's wife and daugthers. Also the side kick was apparently 16 years old and working in the factory when it was closed down...but he looks like he's at least 40-50 in the hentai and the rapist looked like he was 5-10 when it happened so he's also 30-40? And all the other workers?
Wait.... was that a Stockholm syndrome AND a "happy ending" at the last page!? *smh intensifies*

i still can't believe i gained a lesson from hentai lol, you will never solve anything with revenge, the way of those girls forgive him giving me a lesson that there is no end in revenge and the second lesson is everyone deserve a second chance i noticed it at the ending when i saw that he is trying to kill himself but then those girls went to his house, if those girls holding a grudge and not going to his house that will be the end of his life, and also from the bad things that happened to those girls there was also a good thing, if that incident never happen, they will never know that their father never cares about them at all. that's my private opinions have a nice day guys ^^
A good ending for a messed up story wtf
that was some kind of ending wasn't.
Am I the only one who wants these guys to die a slow, painful death?  And also that ending TT^TT
